```py
s = df['Reviews']
df['Reviews'] = df['Reviews'].astype(str)
df = df[df['Reviews'] == s]
df[['polarity', 'subjectivity']] = df['Reviews'].apply(lambda   Text: pd.Series(TextBlob(Text).sentiment))
```
